profile: Using React.js and Solidity, I specialize in building user interfaces that interact with smart contracts. As a Blockchain Developer I am helping to build a world in which opportunity transcends national and institutional borders. I want to make it easy and secure for people all over the world to transact, acquire assets, and prosper. I bring over a decade’s worth of experience in effective communication having worked in various customer service roles, including management.

apps.title: Crypto Voting Dapp
points: A mobile responsive dapplication which tracks voting on the Polygon Mumbai Testnet
Built with React.js, Solidity, and Moralis

apps.title: HLP Blog
points: A full-stack application using React.js and Python/Django
This blog features blog posts written to help me crystalize programming concepts at a high level

apps.title: BookListBuilder
points: A React app which utilizes a random quote generator api as well as the Google Books API
Allows users to search for books and compile a reading list
